title: Account Creation Date
body: Is anyone aware of a way to find out when your account was created? Been playing siince almost the beginning and curious to know.

replies.body: Account creation date is not something we have handy or something available for a player to view.  A big reason for this is that we use it towards helping players with account recovers, so plays will want to keep that info safe.  Let me know if that clears things up!
